materials.*: query.is_name_any('Tropical', 'tropical', 'TROPICAL', 'Tropical Slime', 'Tropical slime', 'TROPICAL SLIME', 'tropical slime') ? Material.tropical : Material.default

textures: query.is_name_any('Tropical', 'tropical', 'TROPICAL', 'Tropical Slime', 'Tropical slime', 'TROPICAL SLIME', 'tropical slime') ? Texture.tropical : Texture.default
query.is_name_any('Tropical', 'tropical', 'TROPICAL', 'Tropical Slime', 'Tropical slime', 'TROPICAL SLIME', 'tropical slime') ? Texture.tropical_shell : Texture.default
